dcterms:creator: J. D. Hamilton
dcterms:description: Synthetic data used to evaluate the performance of the proposed UTC method, demonstrating its ability to detect situations where uncertainty increases and predictions become difficult.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data

dcterms:creator: K. Ito
K. Minami
K. Imajo
K. Nakagawa
dcterms:description: The TOPIX100 Index is a market capitalization-weighted index of large-cap Japanese stocks, consisting of the top 100 stocks with particularly high market capitalization and liquidity. It was used to evaluate the UTC method's performance in real market conditions.
dcterms:title: TOPIX100 Index

dcterms:creator: B. M. Henrique
V. A. Sobreiro
H. Kimura
dcterms:description: Real market data used to demonstrate the effectiveness of the UTC method in achieving higher returns and lower risks compared to baseline methods.
dcterms:title: Real Market Data
